law.catch_line: For purposes of this subtitle, the domicile of an alien insurer is:...
law.text:
For purposes of this subtitle, the domicile of an alien insurer is:
for an alien insurer formed under the laws of Canada or a province of Canada, the province in which its head office is located; and
for any other alien insurer, the state in which its principal place of business in the United States is located.
